body_html:
1. topk selects not just from a vector, but also a dimension from a Tensor (unlike the paper you quoted), so register implications are likely different.
  2. we likely picked one and implemented it. Implement high perf GPU sorting / topk from scratch takes quite a bit of time/effort.

body:
1. topk selects not just from a vector, but also a dimension from a Tensor (unlike the paper you quoted), so register implications are likely different.
2. we likely picked one and implemented it. Implement high perf GPU sorting / topk from scratch takes quite a bit of time/effort.
